Grape

Grapes have high sugar levels and are excellent in juicy and fresh taste thanks to the abundant sunshine amount in harvest time.

Grapes detoxify and cleanse the system encouraging weight loss. It reduce the risk of coronary heart disease and cancer. It’s also rich in fiber and proteins.
